products.name: Papua New Guinea Kigabah Estate Clover® Starbucks Reserve®
products.description: Notes of sweet caramel and green herbs. Surrounded by cloud-covered mountains, the Kigabah Estate is cultivating community and exceptional coffee in one of the most remote and beautiful places in the world.
